name: Ice-Cold II
overview: The blood in your veins had better run ice-cold if you are going to take on the fight for salvation. Do you have what it takes to be an interstellar super pilot? To hold this position you cannot afford to make mistakes. The enemies are crafty and aggressive, try to destroy as many aliens as possible by hitting them with your laser or with one of the two super-destructive rockets at your disposal. If an alien gets through your barrage and hits you, the game, and our hope is finished. Published in Italy as Lotta per la Silvezza in Super C64 e C128 n.53 (febbraio 1991).
